name: ResetUserSessions
description:
Reset all active user sessions immediately.

This tool is used by Enterprise plan Company Admins to reset all active sessions for a user, effectively requiring them to sign in again. It's useful for handling security concerns such as compromised credentials or suspicious account activity.

parameters.name: user_email_to_reset_sessions
parameters.description: Email ID of the user whose sessions need to be reset. This will sign the user out from all devices.

value_schema.description: Email ID of the user whose sessions you want to reset. Note that this user will be signed out from all devices.
